name: Orbitus Talos
description:
Controls: Use your mouse to aim. Click or hold the left mouse button to fire.

This game was made in four hours for the DevAtlas Jam. You are a satellite that must stop asteroids from colliding with your planet. You have a lot of firepower, but watch out! You can damage your own planet if you aim poorly. The asteroids will keep coming so your duty never ends!

All coding, graphics, and music were created by me in the duration of this game jam. I recorded a video of the development process and hope to upload that soon*. Tools I used: Unity, Inkscape, and Reaper.
